entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
